choices.label: Do the glass beakers prevent light from reaching the test samples?

Is the method used for measuring <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mtext>pH</mtext> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeiCaiaabIeaaaa@37B2@</annotation> </semantics> </math> harmful to aquatic organisms?

Does the aquarium water contain living microorganisms?

content.answer: Does the aquarium water contain living microorganisms?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
